dialog: That concludes our business.
Do share with me your knowledge of insurance matters.
At wizarding college, I studied the arts of international banking, including various insurance courses. And I honed my skills during my internship at an insurance firm.
Why have you taken an interest in becoming an insurance wizard?
I am passionate about helping others and I understand the significance of securing one's possessions through insurance.
Have you any prior experience in sales?
Indeed, I have. I have served as a salesman for P & G Company Ltd.
Are you well-liked by those you come into contact with?
Indeed, I possess a way with people that often leads to favorable outcomes.
Ah, here we are.
This is the establishment I mentioned to you earlier.
Would you prefer a seat near the window, friend?
Very well.
Let us peruse the menu. Oh dear, it seems there is no menu. Could you kindly ask the patrons at the next table if they would be so kind as to allow us to see theirs?
Of course. Excuse me. Pardon the intrusion, but could we have a look at your menu? I see, they do not have one either.
Do you have intentions of purchasing a broomstick?
I am still considering it. May I inquire as to its cost?
350 Knuts.
Oh dear, it seems a bit steep. Could you extend a more reasonable offer?
Your discount has already been taken into account. Normally, we ask 400 Knuts, but during this sale period, we are able to offer a special price.
